cards.name: Alleycat
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Cat.
cards.flavorText: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

cards.name: Fiendish Servant
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
cards.flavorText: Putting the "r" in fiend.

cards.name: Micro Mummy
cards.text: Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
cards.flavorText: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

cards.name: Murloc Tidecaller
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
cards.flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

cards.name: Murloc Tidehunter
cards.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
cards.flavorText: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

cards.name: Righteous Protector
cards.text: Taunt Divine Shield
cards.flavorText: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

cards.name: Rockpool Hunter
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

cards.name: Scavenging Hyena
cards.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
cards.flavorText: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything. Even Brussels sprouts.

cards.name: Selfless Hero
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
cards.flavorText: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

cards.name: Vulgar Homunculus
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
cards.flavorText: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

cards.name: Harvest Golem
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
cards.flavorText: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

cards.name: Kaboom Bot
cards.text: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
cards.flavorText: More Boom for your buck.

cards.name: Kindly Grandmother
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
cards.flavorText: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."

cards.name: Metaltooth Leaper
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

cards.name: Murloc Warleader
cards.text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

cards.name: Old Murk-Eye
cards.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
cards.flavorText: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

cards.name: Southsea Captain
cards.text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

cards.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

cards.name: Unstable Ghoul
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
cards.flavorText: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

cards.name: Coldlight Seer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
cards.flavorText: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

cards.name: Crowd Favorite
cards.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

cards.name: Crystalweaver
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

cards.name: Felfin Navigator
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
cards.flavorText: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

cards.name: Houndmaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
cards.flavorText: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks. It's rhetorical.

cards.name: Imp Gang Boss
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
cards.flavorText: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

cards.name: Infested Wolf
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
cards.flavorText: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

cards.name: Khadgar
cards.text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
cards.flavorText: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

cards.name: Rat Pack
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal  to this minion's Attack.
cards.flavorText: He's gonna do it his way.

cards.name: Replicating Menace
cards.text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
cards.flavorText: It's a car! *Whomp whomp whomp* It's a robot! *Whomp whom-CRUNCH* It's… three.. smaller robots!

cards.name: Screwjank Clunker
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

cards.name: The Beast
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
cards.flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain. He eats Gnomes. That's pretty much it.

cards.name: Annoy-o-Module
cards.text: Magnetic Divine Shield Taunt
cards.flavorText: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

cards.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
cards.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
cards.flavorText: He's so hot right now.

cards.name: Cave Hydra
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
cards.flavorText: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

cards.name: Cobalt Scalebane
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
cards.flavorText: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

cards.name: Defender of Argus
cards.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
cards.flavorText: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

cards.name: Floating Watcher
cards.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

cards.name: Iron Sensei
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language. 0110100001101001

cards.name: Mechano-Egg
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
cards.flavorText: When you need more iron in your diet.

cards.name: Savannah Highmane
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
cards.flavorText: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

cards.name: Security Rover
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/3 Mech with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

cards.name: Siegebreaker
cards.text: Taunt Your other Demons have +1 Attack.
cards.flavorText: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

cards.name: Toxfin
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
cards.flavorText: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

cards.name: Virmen Sensei
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: There is no carrot.

cards.name: Whirlwind Tempest
cards.text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
cards.flavorText: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

cards.name: Baron Rivendare
cards.text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
cards.flavorText: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

cards.name: Brann Bronzebeard
cards.text: Your Battlecries trigger twice.
cards.flavorText: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

cards.name: Ironhide Direhorn
cards.text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Ironhide Runt.
cards.flavorText: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

cards.name: Junkbot
cards.text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

cards.name: Mal'Ganis
cards.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
cards.flavorText: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

cards.name: Strongshell Scavenger
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
cards.flavorText: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

cards.name: Voidlord
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 1/3 Demons with Taunt.
cards.flavorText: Never let it hold your checkbook.

cards.name: Foe Reaper 4000
cards.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
cards.flavorText: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

cards.name: Maexxna
cards.text: Poisonous
cards.flavorText: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

cards.name: Deck Swabbie
cards.text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of upgrading Bob's Tavern by (1).

cards.name: Dragonspawn Lieutenant
cards.text: Taunt

cards.name: Micro Machine
cards.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.

cards.name: Red Whelp
cards.text: Start of Combat: Deal 1 damage per friendly Dragon to one random enemy minion.

cards.name: Refreshing Anomaly
cards.text: Battlecry: Your next Refresh costs (0).

cards.name: Scallywag
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Pirate. It attacks immediately.

cards.name: Sellemental
cards.text: When you sell this, add a 2/2 Elemental to your hand.

cards.name: Wrath Weaver
cards.text: After you play a Demon, deal 1 damage to your hero and gain +2/+2.

cards.name: Freedealing Gambler
cards.text: This minion sells for 3 Gold.

cards.name: Glyph Guardian
cards.text: Whenever this attacks, double its Attack.

cards.name: Imprisoner
cards.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Imp.

cards.name: Menagerie Mug
cards.text: Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +1/+1.

cards.name: Molten Rock
cards.text: Taunt. After you play an Elemental, gain +1 Health.

cards.name: Nathrezim Overseer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2/+2.

cards.name: Pack Leader
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +2 Attack.

cards.name: Party Elemental
cards.text: After you play an Elemental, give another random friendly Elemental +1/+1.

cards.name: Pogo-Hopper
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other Pogo-Hopper you played this game.

cards.name: Rabid Saurolisk
cards.text: After you play a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1/+1.

cards.name: Steward of Time
cards.text: When you sell this minion, give all minions in Bob's Tavern +1/+1.

cards.name: Waxrider Togwaggle
cards.text: Whenever a friendly Dragon kills an enemy, gain +2/+2.

cards.name: Arcane Assistant
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Elementals +1/+1.

cards.name: Bloodsail Cannoneer
cards.text: Battlecry: Give your other Pirates +3 Attack.

cards.name: Bronze Warden
cards.text: Divine Shield Reborn

cards.name: Crackling Cyclone
cards.text: Divine Shield Windfury

cards.name: Deflect-o-Bot
cards.text: Divine Shield Whenever you summon a Mech during combat, gain +1 Attack and Divine Shield.

cards.name: Hangry Dragon
cards.text: At the start of your turn, gain +2/+2 if you won the last combat.

cards.name: Monstrous Macaw
cards.text: After this attacks, trigger a random friendly minion's Deathrattle.

cards.name: Piloted Shredder
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.

cards.name: Salty Looter
cards.text: Whenever you play a Pirate, gain +1/+1.

cards.name: Shifter Zerus
cards.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.

cards.name: Soul Juggler
cards.text: After a friendly Demon dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.

cards.name: Stasis Elemental
cards.text: Battlecry: Add another random Elemental to Bob's Tavern and Freeze it.

cards.name: Twilight Emissary
cards.text: Taunt Battlecry: Give a friendly Dragon +2/+2.

cards.name: Yo-Ho-Ogre
cards.text: Taunt After this minion survives being attacked, attack immediately.

cards.name: Deadly Spore
cards.text: Poisonous

cards.name: Drakonid Enforcer
cards.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2/+2.

cards.name: Goldgrubber
cards.text: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+2 for each friendly Golden minion.

cards.name: Herald of Flame
cards.text: Overkill: Deal 3 damage to the left-most enemy minion.

cards.name: Majordomo Executus
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give your left-most minion +1/+1 for each Elemental you played this turn.

cards.name: Menagerie Jug
cards.text: Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +2/+2.

cards.name: Primalfin Lookout
cards.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.

cards.name: Ripsnarl Captain
cards.text: Whenever another friendly Pirate attacks, give it +2/+2.

cards.name: Southsea Strongarm
cards.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Pirate +1/+1 for each Pirate you bought this turn.

cards.name: Wildfire Elemental
cards.text: After this attacks and kills a minion, deal excess damage to a random adjacent minion.

cards.name: Annihilan Battlemaster
cards.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each damage your hero has taken.

cards.name: Cap'n Hoggarr
cards.text: After you buy a Pirate, gain 1 Gold this turn only.

cards.name: King Bagurgle
cards.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give your other Murlocs +2/+2.

cards.name: Lightfang Enforcer
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give a friendly minion of each minion type +2/+1.

cards.name: Lil' Rag
cards.text: After you play an Elemental, give a friendly minion stats equal to the Elemental's Tavern Tier.

cards.name: Mama Bear
cards.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +4/+4.

cards.name: Murozond
cards.text: Battlecry: Add a minion from your last opponent's warband to your hand.

cards.name: Nat Pagle, Extreme Angler
cards.text: When this attacks and kills a minion, add a random minion to your hand.

cards.name: Nomi, Kitchen Nightmare
cards.text: After you play an Elemental, Elementals in Bob's Tavern have +1/+1 for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Razorgore, the Untamed
cards.text: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+1 for each Dragon you have.

cards.name: Seabreaker Goliath
cards.text: Windfury Overkill: Give your other Pirates +2/+2.

cards.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Legendary minion.

cards.name: Tavern Tempest
cards.text: Battlecry: Add another random Elemental to your hand.

cards.name: Amalgadon
cards.text: Battlecry: For each different minion type you have, Adapt randomly.

cards.name: Dread Admiral Eliza
cards.text: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +1/+1.

cards.name: Gentle Djinni
cards.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon another random Elemental and add a copy of it to your hand.

cards.name: Ghastcoiler
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon 2 random Deathrattle minions.

cards.name: Goldrinn, the Great Wolf
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your Beasts +5/+5.

cards.name: Imp Mama
cards.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a random Demon and give it Taunt.

cards.name: Kalecgos, Arcane Aspect
cards.text: After you play a minion with Battlecry, give your Dragons +1/+1.

cards.name: Kangor's Apprentice
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon the first 2 friendly Mechs that died this combat.

cards.name: Lieutenant Garr
cards.text: Taunt. After you play an Elemental, gain +1 Health for each Elemental you have.

cards.name: Nadina the Red
cards.text: Deathrattle: Give your Dragons Divine Shield.

cards.name: The Tide Razor
cards.text: Deathrattle: Summon 3 random Pirates.

cards.name: Zapp Slywick
cards.text: Windfury This minion always attacks the enemy minion with the lowest Attack.
